text: Hamster and Gretel is an American animated television series. It was created by Dan Povenmire for Disney Channel in 2022. The series is a spin-off of Phineas and Ferb and Milo Murphyâ€™s Law. ==Story== A teenage boy named Kevin and his 10-year-old sister Gretel are visited by aliens. The aliens say they will give superpowers to Kevin and Gretel. The aliens actually give the powers to Gretel and her pet hamster. This turns them into superheroes. Kevin is jealous that he does not get any powers. However, he helps Hamster and Gretel protect their city from villains. Category:2020s American animated television series Category:2022 American television series debuts Category:Television series by Disney
title: Hamster & Gretel
